metadata.title: CVE-2019-20433 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.description: libaspell.a in GNU Aspell before 0.60.8 has a buffer over-read for a stringending with a single '\0' byte, if the encoding is set to ucs-2 or ucs-4outside of the application, as demonstrated by the ASPELL_CONF environmentvariable.

criterions.comment: aspell: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
